common.skip: Skip for now (Features will be limited)

connect_ui.scan_qr_instruction: Ask your friend to scan the QR code or search for the group name
connect_ui.tap_to_join: Tap on your friend's image to join
connect_ui.tap_friend_avatar: Tap on your friend's avatar to join
connect_ui.qr_scan_instruction: When creating a connection, a QR code will be generated to join the group. You must scan the QR code. If you want to add the other party as a friend, you must scan their QR code.
connect_ui.perm_gps_desc: App requires GPS to scan local hotspot
connect_ui.vpn_off_desc: VPN may block WiFi Direct connection. Please turn it off manually.

permissions.full_access_msg: To access game data/obb files, please enable "All files access" in the next screen.
permissions.camera_msg: Please grant camera permission to scan QR codes.
permissions.msg: Some permissions were denied. The app may not function correctly.
permissions.title: Welcome to Mister Share
permissions.onboarding_msg: To share files and connect with friends, Mister Share needs access to your Photos, Media, and Location (for finding devices).
permissions.storage_msg: Storage permission is required to browse files.
permissions.settings_msg: Please enable permissions in settings to use the app.
permissions.required_desc: To view your photos, videos, and music, MisterShare needs access to your device storage.
permissions.all_files_desc: Required to see system folders like OBB and DATA.
permissions.install_desc: Required for complete access to game files and installations.
permissions.root_access_msg: To show all files and folders in Android/obb, please select "Use this folder" in the next screen.
permissions.saf_direct_msg: To access files in this folder {{path}} please select "Use this folder" in the next screen.
permissions.saf_workaround_instructions:
If you cannot select the folder, your Android version might be restricting access.

Solution:
1. Go to Settings > Apps > Files (Google)
2. Tap '3 dots' > Uninstall Updates
3. Try again

Do you want to open Files app settings?

errors.wifi_p2p_unavailable:
WiFi Direct service is not available on this device. Please ensure:

1. WiFi is turned ON
2. Location is turned ON
3. Your device supports WiFi Direct
4. Try restarting your device
errors.permission_denied: Permission denied. Please grant all required permissions in Settings.
errors.wifi_busy: WiFi is busy. Please disconnect from current WiFi and try again.
errors.hotspot_conflict_msg: Your system Personal Hotspot seems to be ON. Please turn it OFF to use this feature.
errors.hotspot_incompatible: Cannot start Hotspot. Please turn OFF your personal WiFi Hotspot/Tethering in Settings and try again.

onboarding.desc_1: Share apps, videos, and music instantly with nearby devices using our 5GHz engine.
onboarding.desc_2: We need access to your files and location to discover peers. Your data never leaves your local network.

history.title: Transfer History
history.empty_hint: Transfer files to see them here
history.clear_desc: All transfer records will be deleted

help.subtitle: Find guides, features, and support below.
help.feat_speed_desc: Transfer files at lightning speeds without internet.
help.feat_secure_desc: Your data is encrypted and transferred directly between devices.
help.step1_desc: Choose apps, photos, videos, or files from the main screen.
help.step2_desc: Tap 'Send' or 'Receive'. Scan the QR code on the other device.
help.step3_desc: Watch the magic happen! Files transfer instantly.

game_restore.title: Game Restore
game_restore.install_desc: Ensure the game is installed from Play Store or the APK you just received.
game_restore.open_desc: Open the game and wait 5-10 seconds until it reaches the loading screen, then close it. This creates the necessary folders.
game_restore.grant_desc: We need permission to write the game files to the specific secure folder.
game_restore.step3_msg: You will be redirected to the system file picker. Please tap 'Use this folder' at the bottom of the screen.
game_restore.restore_ask: Do you want to include extra game files (OBB)? This allows the game to play immediately on the other device.
game_restore.restore_ask_full: Do you want to include game files (OBB + DATA)? This allows the game to work immediately on the other device.
game_restore.perm_msg: Please select the game's folder to allow us to read the OBB files.
game_restore.perm_msg_full: We need permission for both OBB and DATA folders. Select each folder when the picker appears.
game_restore.data_zip_not_ready_message: Please wait until game data compression finishes, then try again.
